GK16jaycndpu:407: sānau yasyābhavad yuddhaṃ tad dhūrjaṭikirīṭinoḥ // JCand_5.114 //

GK16jaycndpu:413: alaṅkārān imān sapta kecid āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // JCand_5.117 //
GK16jaycndpu:415: eteṣām eva vinyāsān nālaṅkārāntarāṇy amī // JCand_5.118 //
GK16jaycndpu:417: upādhiḥ kvacid udbhinnaḥ syād anyatrāpi saṃbhavāt // JCand_5.119 //
GK16jaycndpu:419: manuṣye bhavataḥ kvāpi hy alaṅkārāṅgatāṃ gate // JCand_5.120 //
GK16jaycndpu:423: prāyeṇāmī hy alaṃkārā bhinnā nātiśayoktitaḥ // JCand_5.122 //
GK16jaycndpu:427: tad arvācīnabhedeṣu nāmnāṃ nāmnāya iṣyatām // JCand_5.124 //
GK16jaycndpu:428: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau /
GK16jaycndpu:429: caturthaḥ saikoyam sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ // JCand_5.125 //
GK16jaycndpu:431: kāryo 'nubhāvo bhāvaś ca sahāyo vyabhicāry api // JCand_6.1 //
GK16jaycndpu:434: kāvye nāṭye ca kārye ca vibhāvādyair vibhāvitaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:435: āsvādyamānaikatanuḥ sthāyī bhāvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ // JCand_6.3 //
GK16jaycndpu:439: sambhogo vipralambhaś ca śṛṅgāro dvividho mataḥ // JCand_6.5 //
GK16jaycndpu:443: vibhāvādyair yutaḥ śoka-sthāyī syāt karuṇo rasaḥ // JCand_6.7 //
GK16jaycndpu:449: bhāvair mohādibhir yukto bhayasthāyī bhayānakaḥ // JCand_6.10 //
GK16jaycndpu:459: ālasyaṃ caiva dainyaṃ ca cintā mohaḥ smṛtir dhṛtiḥ // JCand_6.15 //
GK16jaycndpu:460: vrīḍā capalatā harṣa āvego jaḍatā tathā /
GK16jaycndpu:461: garvo viṣāda autsukyaṃ nidrāpasmāra eva ca // JCand_6.16 //
GK16jaycndpu:463: matir vyādhis tathonmādas tathā maraṇam eva ca // JCand_6.17 //
GK16jaycndpu:464: trāsaś caiva vitarkaś ca vijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:465: trayastriṃśad ime bhāvāḥ samākhyātās tu nāmataḥ // JCand_6.18 //
GK16jaycndpu:467: anaucityā rasābhāsā bhāvābhāsāś ca kīrtitāḥ // JCand_6.19 //
GK16jaycndpu:468: bhāvasya śāntir udayaḥ sandhiḥ śabalatā tathā /
GK16jaycndpu:471: samāsaḥ syāt padair na syāt samāsaḥ sarvathāpi ca // JCand_6.21 //
GK16jaycndpu:472: pāñcālikī ca lāṭīyā gauḍīyā ca yathārasam /
GK16jaycndpu:473: vaidarbhī ca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ catasro rītayaḥ smṛtāḥ // JCand_6.22 //
GK16jaycndpu:475: lakāraś ca lasaṃyukto hrasvavyavahitau raṇau // JCand_6.23 //
GK16jaycndpu:477: kapākrāntas tavargaḥ syāt prauḍhāyāṃ ca kamūrdhatā // JCand_6.24 //
GK16jaycndpu:478: sarvair ūrdhvaiḥ sakārasya sarvai rephasya sarvathā /
GK16jaycndpu:479: rahor dvedhā tu saṃyogaḥ paruṣāyāṃ śaṣau svataḥ // JCand_6.25 //
GK16jaycndpu:481: lalitāyāṃ tathā śeṣā bhadrāyām iti vṛttayaḥ // JCand_6.26 //
GK16jaycndpu:485: lalanā rabhasaṃ dhatte ghanāṭope mahīyasi // JCand_6.28 //
GK16jaycndpu:486: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau /
GK16jaycndpu:487: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mahati ṛtusaṃkhyaḥ // JCand_6.29 //
GK16jaycndpu:489: bhāratī bhāti gambhīrā kuṭilā saralā kvacit // JCand_7.1 //
GK16jaycndpu:491: kaṭākṣa iva lolākṣyā vyāpāro vyañjanātmakaḥ // JCand_7.2 //
GK16jaycndpu:492: avivakṣitavācyasya dvau bhedau vācyam eva cet /
GK16jaycndpu:493: arthāntire saṃkramitam atyantaṃ vā tiraskṛtam // JCand_7.3 //
GK16jaycndpu:495: catvāriṃśadyutaikena bhedāḥ ṣaṭ cānayoḥ kramāt // JCand_7.4 //
GK16jaycndpu:499: arthaśaktisamutthasya bhedā dvādaśa tad yathā // JCand_7.6 //
GK16jaycndpu:500: catvāro vastv alaṃkāram alaṃkāras tu vastu yat /
GK16jaycndpu:501: alaṃkāram alaṃkāro vastu vastu vyanakti tat // JCand_7.7 //
GK16jaycndpu:503: svasiddho vā vyañjako 'rthaś catvāras triguṇās tataḥ // JCand_7.8 //
GK16jaycndpu:508: ye ṣoḍaśādyā dviguṇās te syur vākyapadāśrayāt /
GK16jaycndpu:509: prabandhe 'pi dvādaśa syur arthaśaktibhuvo bhidaḥ // JCand_7.11 //
GK16jaycndpu:511: bhedāḥ syur ekapañcāśat saṃbhinnās tu sahasraśaḥ // JCand_7.12 //
GK16jaycndpu:513: svāṅkuritam atadrūpaṃ svayam ullasitaṃ giraḥ // JCand_7.13 //
GK16jaycndpu:515: kaścit taṭasthaḥ kaścic ca bodhitapratibodhitaḥ // JCand_7.14 //
GK16jaycndpu:517: upekṣānihnavābhyāṃ ca dvidhā svāṅkuritaṃ matam // JCand_7.15 //
GK16jaycndpu:521: arthe 'rtham anyaṃ yaṃ vakti tad vācyavyaṅgyam iṣyate // JCand_7.17 //
GK16jaycndpu:522: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau /
GK16jaycndpu:523: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mahati munisaṃkhyaḥ // JCand_7.18 //
GK16jaycndpu:524: yad vyajyamānaṃ manasaḥ staimityāya sa no dhvaniḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:525: anyathā tu guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyam āpatitaṃ tridhā // JCand_8.1 //
GK16jaycndpu:526: vyaktir eva kvacid vyaṅgyaḥ kvacid arthasvabhāvataḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:527: kvacic cārutarasyāgre sa vimuñcati cārutām // JCand_8.2 //
GK16jaycndpu:529: vismṛtaḥ kim apāṃnātha sa tvayā kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ // JCand_8.3 //
GK16jaycndpu:531: hā hā/ matkucakāśmīra-liptaṃ bhinnam uraḥ śaraiḥ // JCand_8.4 //
GK16jaycndpu:532: tathā vācyasya siddhyaṅgaṃ naur artho vāridher yathā /
GK16jaycndpu:533: saṃśritya taraṇiṃ dhīrās taranti vyādhivāridhīn // JCand_8.5 //
GK16jaycndpu:535: kuṅkumāktaṃ stanadvandvaṃ mānasaṃ mama gāhate // JCand_8.6 //
GK16jaycndpu:539: kānte tvadānanarucā glānim eti saroruham // JCand_8.8 //
GK16jaycndpu:540: asundaraṃ yadi vyaṅgyaṃ syād vācyād amanoharam /
GK16jaycndpu:543: ity aṣṭadhā guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyam aṅgīkṛtaṃ budhaiḥ // JCand_8.10 //
GK16jaycndpu:544: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau /
GK16jaycndpu:545: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke mahati vasusaṃkhyaḥ sukhayatu // JCand_8.11 //
GK16jaycndpu:547: prayojanāc ca saṃbaddhaṃ vadantī lakṣaṇā matā // JCand_9.1 //
GK16jaycndpu:551: viduḥ sphuṭaṃ taṭasthatvād arthagatvād dvidhā budhāḥ // JCand_9.3 //
GK16jaycndpu:555: asphuṭatvaṃ taṭasthatvaṃ lakṣyasthatvam amuṣya ca // JCand_9.5 //
GK16jaycndpu:556: anyās tisra iti vyaktā śaktitaḥ sā caturvidhā /
GK16jaycndpu:557: indur evaiṣa tadvaktram utkarṣo lakṣyate mukhe // JCand_9.6 //
GK16jaycndpu:559: paṭo 'yaṃ dagdha ityādau sphuṭaṃ nāsti prayojanam // JCand_9.7 //
GK16jaycndpu:566: gauṇaṃ sāropam uddiṣṭam indur mukham itīdṛśam /
GK16jaycndpu:567: gauṇaṃ sādhyavasānaṃ syād indur evedam īdṛśam // JCand_9.11 //
GK16jaycndpu:568: śuddhaṃ sāropam uddiṣṭam āyur ghṛtam itīdṛśam /
GK16jaycndpu:569: śuddhaṃ sādhyavasānaṃ syād āyur evedam īdṛśam // JCand_9.12 //
GK16jaycndpu:571: kuntā viśanti gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣo nivasatīti ca // JCand_9.13 //
GK16jaycndpu:573: sarasaṃ kāvyam amṛtaṃ vidyā sthirataraṃ dhanam // JCand_9.14 //
GK16jaycndpu:575: saundaryeṇaiṣa kandarpaḥ sā ca mūrtimatī ratiḥ // JCand_9.15 //
GK16jaycndpu:576: śabde padārthe vākyārthe saṃkhyāyāṃ kārake tathā /
GK16jaycndpu:578: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau /
GK16jaycndpu:579: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke mahati navasaṃkhyaḥ sukhayatu // JCand_9.17 //
GK16jaycndpu:580: dharmaṃ kaṃcit puraskṛtya prāyaḥ śabdaḥ pravartate /
GK16jaycndpu:581: yayārthaṃ spaṣṭam ācaṣṭe śabdas tām abhidhāṃ viduḥ // JCand_10.1 //
GK16jaycndpu:583: nirdeśena tathā prāhuḥ ṣaḍvidhām abhidhāṃ budhāḥ // JCand_10.2 //
GK16jaycndpu:584: gaur nīlaḥ pācako daṇḍī ḍitthaḥ kaṃsa iti kramāt /
GK16jaycndpu:585: kaṃ saṃhinasti kaṃsārir naraṃ ca kaṃ samāśritam // JCand_10.3 //
GK16jaycndpu:589: sudhānidhānam āsādya śrayadhvaṃ vibudhā mudam // JCand_10.5 //
GK16jaycndpu:592: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau /
GK16jaycndpu:593: mayūkhas tenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke mahati daśasaṃkhyaḥ sukhayatu // JCand_10.7 //
